business.name: Artistic Blacksmithing Workshop Tadeusz Karny
business.title: Artistic Blacksmithing – Services
business.description: Custom artistic blacksmithing: gates, railings and fences made to order. Craftsmanship and tradition since 1985.

home.title: Artistic Blacksmith Białystok | Custom gates, railings & fences – Tadeusz Karny
home.description: Looking for a blacksmith in Białystok, Poland? Tadeusz Karny crafts bespoke gates, railings and fences – traditional artistic blacksmithing for 30+ years.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn about our artistic blacksmithing workshop specializing in high-quality custom metalwork with over 20 years of experience.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: Browse our portfolio of gates, railings and fences.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Contact us to discuss your custom gate, fence or railing – by phone, email or an on-site visit to our workshop.
